Crack Attack

A simple game based on Tetris Attack by Nintendo. This is an in progress HTML based remake of an exisiting open source game.

  • View Site
  • github

How to play

The aim of the game is to last longer than your opponant. You have a tetris like playing board with coloured blocks riseing from the bottom. You have to swap blocks round to make groups of 3 or more of the same colour, which are then removed from the board. If the group is large enough then junk blocks are sent to your opponant which fall from the top of the screen, making their pile of blocks taller. A player losses the game when their tower of blocks goes past the top of te screen.

There is a single player element as well where you aim to get the best score possible, and garbage blocks are sent to your self.

Move the cursor with the arrow keys and use space to swap the selected blocks around. You can only swap left to right.
